title.en: Merched y Wawr Bro Radur Branch Celebrate 25 Years
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Bro Radur yn dathlu Chwarter Canrif

description.en:
.
Aelodau Merched y Wawr Cangen Bro Radur yn dathlu 25ain mlynedd y gangen yn Neuadd Capel y Methodistiaid, Radur ar Fehefin 3ydd, 2015.
 Dyma'r enwau:-  Rhes gefn - Doreen Thomas, Eleanor Jones, Elsbeth Edwards, Avril Pickard, Margaret Jones, Mair Morgan, Delyth Williams, Eiryl Walters, Eira Phillips, Ann Williams, Eira Williams, Gwenan Richards, Eirian Dafydd, Meri Griffiths, Heulwen Jones,

Rhes ganol :- Eirlys Davies, Eirlys Ekley, Jean Salisbury, Elinor Davies, Marian Davies,Elizabeth Williams, Brenda Jones, Maria Hampson-Jones, Doreen Jones, Eleri Jones, Carys Tudor Williams, Zoe Pearce, Shirley Williams, Liz Reynolds, Ann Rees, Megan Morris, Elen Lewis, 

Yn eistedd :- Hafwen Roberts, Menna Brown, Mary Wiliam, Enid Edwards, Mair Penri Jones(gwraig wâdd) Meryl Davies(Llywydd Cenedlaethol) Carys Puw Williams, Nia Jones, Rhiannon Evans, Glenys Thomas, Janice Jones, Marian Jones, Eirlys Roberts.
